Key Match Events: The Mets' losing streak was extended to four games
Jose Iglesias extended his hitting streak to 14 games
Alec Bohm hit a three-run home run
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets maintained their two-game lead over the Braves for the NL’s third wild card
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies clinched a postseason berth for a third straight year
Others: David Peterson struggled in the Mets’ loss to the Phillies on Friday night
Adam Ottavino served up a back-breaking homer in the Mets’ loss
The Mets played a fifth straight game without Francisco Lindor
Jose Iglesias provided one of the few bright spots Friday with a leadoff homer
Pete Alonso botched a pop up in the loss on Friday night
J.D. Martinez went hitless in three at-bats and extended his drought to 0-for-31
